title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, cured pork (guanciale or pancetta), and black pepper. Simple yet incredibly rich and satisfying.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Tender chunks of marinated and grilled chicken (tikka) simmered in a rich, creamy, and subtly spiced tomato-based gravy. A popular British curry house staple.

title: Vegetable Curry
summary: A vibrant and aromatic medley of seasonal vegetables cooked in a fragrant coconut milk-based sauce with Indian spices. Perfect for a healthy and flavorful meal.

title: Lentil Soup
summary: A hearty and nutritious soup packed with protein-rich lentils, vegetables, and aromatic herbs. A comforting and easy-to-make dish for any day.
